name: Total Mods for FF4
description:
You must install Tabs Mix Plus and change min & max tab width to 34px.
-Make FF4 all glass
-Change about:home favicon to home icon and feedly favicon to feed icon.
-Uploader link with favicon (on the left side, if you combine with universal & rapidshare link checker userscript, on every download link of Rapid, mega, mediafire,... will have an icon show you what file server host those link and a green/red icon on the right to check if the link alive or dead)
-Increase active tab width to 150px (Combine with Tabs Mix Plus, it will create an  effect that faviconize all inactive tabs.)

* I do all this stub for my own.
